This user has dispatches in their name. If you want to inactivate them, you will first need to remove their dispatches.

Customer, LoadAt and Item can't be changed when there are loaded dispatches
This user has dispatches in their name. If you want to remove their driver role, you will first need to remove their dispatches.

Enter the utilization you want each truck to have.
This is the fraction of a day that you want each truck to work this job. This should be a decimal number between 0 and 1 where 1 means each truck will work this job all day long.
You must change your password before linking this account!
You must change your password before logging on!
Chat is not enabled for tenant.
Chat is not enabled for you.

Write only username for same tenant users,
[tenancyName]\[userName] for other tenant's users

for example:
.\admin -> for host admin
Test\admin -> for test tenant's admin
admin -> for your tenant's admin

Customer Portal feature is enabled but you are not using a customer user. Please contact support to resolve this issue.

In this demo, you can use the left menu to test the application. This dashboard page is just for demonstration, but all other pages and functionalities are fully implemented, working and ready for production. You can add/apply your business requirements on this startup project (or remove any functionality you don't need). Thus, you can have a signification time gain to immediately start your own project requirements.
Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!
See Demo for Multi-Page Application version with ASP.NET MVC and jQuery.
Notice: There is also a Single-Page Application version built using ASP.NET MVC and AngularJs.

The time on job for the dispatches to this driver do not fall in the same order as the dispatches. You may want to edit the times of the other dispatches so they are in the proper order and will reflect the expected times on job.

If you are entering tickets without first scheduling the truck on a job, you should check this. If you are using the scheduling functionality, this should be left unchecked so the system will require you to select a truck and driver that were assigned to the job.

Select yes to replace the driver assignment and the driver in the truck for this job. Select no to create a second driver assignment that will allow multiple drivers in this truck for the day.

This driver has time off scheduled and can't be assigned to the truck during that time off. If the driver isn't taking this time off, you will first need to remove their time off to assign them to the truck.

Send only the first order of the day

This option only sends the first order of the day scheduled for each truck. The subsequent dispatches need to be sent individually from the schedule. This option gives the least confusion and allows the most flexibility in scheduling changes.
